name: Mechfight Remake
description:
This is an attempt to remake an old public domain game by Florian & Christoph Marquardt available on the 1990 CDPD cd-rom for the Amiga.  I had a great time playing this back in the day and thought I'd try remkaing it for modern platforms.

You can play the original in an emulator if you have the disk image, or you can also try playing it in your browser over at Archive.org
